reviews.text: A really good teacher. Teaches super well and little essays and tests. I would recommend her and take her again for sure.

Not the best English teacher ever but I get the impression that she really cares about her students and has an awareness that her teaching has some problems. Her AP English class is almost all group work and teaching to the AP test, which isn’t horrible per say but there is less discussion compared to what I expected and have heard about other AP English classes.

Such a bad personality and bad teacher. I had her for freshmen english and wanted to kill myself. She once gave me a zero on a test because I turned it in 2 seconds late. Definitely plays favorites too. Easy A but at a cost
Enjoy not learning. At least you get an A.
Can have a bad attitude, but is a decent teacher. Easy A if you listen to her and do your work.Submitted by a student
So fun and SO INTERESTINGSubmitted by a student

One of the worst English teachers at Lowell. Ms. Bajet barely teaches. We do a lot of reading in-class. But she doesn't guide us with analysis (which is crucial for sophomores). She seems lazy/preoccupied with personal issues. I only approached her once for help with an essay and she said she couldn't help me. (?!?!) She made me dislike English class very much. The only good thing was that we barely had any graded work so my grade stayed the same the entire semester.Submitted by a student
i didn't learn anything in her class... i get confused with the assignments and every thing she assigns isn't helpful.Submitted by a student

doesn’t teach anything. grades based on her mood. complains about personal life ALL the time. gives random participation grade even though there are few participation opportunities. easy A if she likes you but you won’t learn anything at all. WOULD NOT RECOMMEND EVER TAKING HER CLASS!!!!Submitted by a student

She was one of the chilliest teachers Ive had so far. Wrote like 1 or 2 essays the whole semester and didn't do much during her class. She makes you participate a little bit, but that was about it. If you take a while to reflect upon her, you'll see that she was an easy teacher. When she goes on about her life which takes up like 20 mins of class, it's pretty amusing. We watched movies which was pretty nice. If you need extra time for an essay, just ask her about it and she'll give it to you.Submitted by a student

I think people are way too harsh with Ms B. She's really a nice person, but people can be pretty disrespectful in her class. If she asks you to put your phone away, do it, or she will start getting frustrated with you.She assigns very little work, and gives you a lot of class time to work on the few assignments. She also pushes deadlines back a lot.I personally think the class is pretty chill, but she definitely does have favorites. She cares about the students and is understandingSubmitted by a student

She is horrible. She assigns way to much work for a regular English class and she never explains what/ how to do the work. She's always complaining about herself and going on and on about stuff in France. I have not learned a single thing about writing an essay.
This is my second class with her. She’s great. She always goes out of her way to help me and others. My writing has improved.Submitted by a student

She was a pretty good teacher, better than Wade from what people said about her. You should take her especially 1st block because she is super chill. Wrote only 3 essays this semester and had a few homework here and there. Her class is interesting and slightly boring at times but overall I enjoyed her class better than Lo. Easy A if you have good handwriting for homework, B if you don't. Participate so she'll give you extra credit to boost it up and take her she is really easy.
doesn’t teach and only has you meditate talks about life problems to kids who only are here to learn. really bad teacher 1/10 wouldn’t recommendSubmitted by a student
